plot: Two cousins are called by a lawyer to receive the estate of a deceased aunt, valued at one million pesos, on the condition of educating three little girls.
title: Bendito entre las mujeres
plot_es: Two cousins are called by a lawyer to receive the estate of a deceased aunt, valued at one million pesos, on the condition of educating three little girls.
plot_en: Two cousins are called by a lawyer to receive the estate of a deceased aunt, valued at one million pesos, on the condition of educating three little girls.
